short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover H1B Sponsorship status effortlessly with 'H1B Sponsor Checker' – your shortcut to informed job searches in the U.S.!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "H1B Sponsor Checker" – your essential tool for streamlined U.S. job searches. This extension scans LinkedIn and Indeed, categorizing companies into H1B sponsors (Category 1) and H1B cap-exempt entities (Category 2). Plus, rest easy with USCIS data verification, ensuring accuracy.

Key Features:

LinkedIn and Indeed Integration: Seamless analysis of job postings.

Efficient H1B Status Check: Instantly identifies H1B sponsors (Category 1) and cap-exempt entities (Category 2).

USCIS Data Verification: Cross-checked against USCIS data for reliability.

User-Friendly Interface: Quick, precise results for easy navigation.
Save Time and Effort: Eliminates manual research on visa policies.

Whether eyeing corporate giants or non-profits, "H1B Sponsor Checker" empowers your U.S. job hunt. Download now for a decisive step toward your dream job!
